headline: PRINGLES® DROPS "ONCE YOU POP" MYSTERY BOXES FEATURING LIMITED-EDITION COLLECTIBLE CRISP-INSPIRED CHARACTERS AND MYSTERY FLAVOR CANS
summary: As part of Pringles' latest "Once You Pop, The Pop Don't Stop" campaign, an evolution of its iconic tagline, the brand is putting a Pringle-y spin on culture's latest obsession, mystery boxes and collectible characters, with its own line ofOnce You Pop Mystery Boxes, launching on the brand's first-ever D2C platform – the Pringles Once You Pop Market.

content.title: PRINGLES® DROPS "ONCE YOU POP" MYSTERY BOXES FEATURING LIMITED-EDITION COLLECTIBLE CRISP-INSPIRED CHARACTERS AND MYSTERY FLAVOR CANS
content.summary: As part of Pringles' latest "Once You Pop, The Pop Don't Stop" campaign, an evolution of its iconic tagline, the brand is putting a Pringle-y spin on culture's latest obsession, mystery boxes and collectible characters, with its own line ofOnce You Pop Mystery Boxes, launching on the brand's first-ever D2C platform – the Pringles Once You Pop Market.

thumbnail.caption: Pringles® Drops "Once You Pop" Mystery Boxes Featuring Limited-Edition Collectible Crisp-Inspired Characters and Mystery Flavor Cans
